about.summary: 'mcgibbsit' provides an implementation of Warnes & Raftery's MCGibbsit run-length diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers.  It combines the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman and Rubin MCMC convergence diagnostic.

'mcgibbsit' provides an implementation of Warnes & Raftery's MCGibbsit run-length diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers.  It combines the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman and Rubin MCMC convergence diagnostic.

name: r-mcgibbsit
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mcgibbsit
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mcgibbsit_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mcgibbsit/mcgibbsit_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cea7468561e37e6184937f4c3a5d4bc73b23600b601b930c8175a9f1e562cd27

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-coda
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-coda

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mcgibbsit')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mcgibbsit')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mcgibbsit
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: '''mcgibbsit'' provides an implementation of Warnes & Raftery''s MCGibbsit run-length
    diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers.  It combines
    the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic
    with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman and Rubin MCMC convergence
    diagnostic.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
